PDO

A PDO is equivalent to a frame. It is a container for one or multiple data points. In CANOpen, you get four PDO frames for reading (TPDOs) and four PDO frames for writing (RPDOs) per device node by default.

What do you want to do?

Edit PDO

To edit a PDO frame, right-click the PDO Channel and select Edit PDO from the shortcut menu. This will pop up a dialog box that will allow the user to configure the PDO frame, including how to convert the data to engineering units.
